title: Database Launch: γ-Secretase Comparative Analysis Platform
content: We are excited to announce the launch of our comprehensive γ-secretase comparative database. This platform provides researchers with detailed sequence alignments, structural comparisons, and evolutionary analysis across multiple species.

title: New Structural Data: High-Resolution γ-Secretase Complex
content: Added high-resolution structural models for all four γ-secretase subunits based on the latest cryo-EM structures. These models provide unprecedented detail into the catalytic mechanism and substrate binding sites.

title: Research Highlight: Evolutionary Conservation Analysis
content: Our analysis reveals remarkable conservation of catalytic residues across species, while substrate-binding regions show species-specific adaptations. This data supports the dual role of γ-secretase in both essential development and pathological processes.

title: Interactive Features: 3D Structure Viewer Enhanced
content: The 3D structure viewer now supports real-time comparison of protein structures across species, with highlighting of conserved and variable regions. Users can now visualize evolutionary changes in three-dimensional context.

title: Data Update: Mouse Model Sequences Added
content: Complete sequence data for mouse γ-secretase subunits has been added to the database, including detailed functional annotations and experimental validation data from knockout studies.
